column2: FEATURED;Phnom Penh: The Phnom Penh Municipal Court on the morning of the 22nd of October this morning opened proceedings against tycoon Oknha Kith Thieng
column3: on drug charges related to the raid in February on the ------Rock Entertainment Center------.------However the accused tycoon was did not attend the hearing
column4: A statement by  the defense team was read to the court
column5: informing them that he was too ill to get to court.------*Kith Thieng is believed to still be in Soviet-Friendship hospital after being transferred there fro PJ Prison in April. ------KOHSANTEPHEAP
